name: BetterWikia - LoL
description: An addon for style 134937 for the League of Legends (LoL) Wiki.
additional_info:
Removes the background image and replaces it with the blue accent color used in the page.
Makes the grid of all items in League visible at the bottom of item pages (e.g. http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Item#List_of_Items_.5Bedit.5D).
